item.title: Kaylene add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Silence is the perfectest herault of joy. I were but little happy if I could say how much." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kaylene add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Happiness is the consequence of personal effort. You fight for it, strive for it, insist upon it, and sometimes even travel around the world looking for it. You have to participate relentlessly in the manifestations of your own blessings. And once you have achieved a state of happiness, you must never become lax about maintaining it. You must make a mighty effort to keep swimming upward into that happiness forever, to stay afloat on top of it." -- Elizabeth Gilbert
